subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Danny Cepero became the first goalkeeper to score in a Major League Soccer game and Juan Pablo Ángel had two goals to lead the Red Bulls to a 3-1 victory over the Columbus Crew on Saturday night at Giants Stadium. Cepero, who has been with the Red Bulls (10-10-9) for two seasons but never played, started because Jon Conway, the regular goalkeeper, was suspended 10 games for using a banned substance.
